Net Sales
First-year net sales of $131.4 million in fiscal year 2018 increased $5.0 million from $180.3 million in fiscal year 2017. The increase was primarily attributable to a $2.4 million increase in gross margin driven by higher net sales, as well as the benefit of completed restructuring activities. The increase was also partially offset by a $1.6 million increase in SG&A expenses, a $0.4 million increase in R&D expenses, and a $0.2 million increase in R&D expenses.
